author: Sheefali
text:
Dear Men,

Marry her only if..

1) Her caste is same as yours; unconditional love for years shouldn't matter.

2) Her Kundali is perfect; her support and loyalty shouldn't matter.

3) Is a boss lady with corporate job( Gov. job is also OK); care and commitment shouldn't matter. https://t.co/I75ZLVME4U
